<effect>研究50%的无底深坑实验室

Text: All our engineers now agree we need the Bottomless Pit Lab. We're not sure if it was worth the costs though.
Translation: 现在，我们的工程师团队一致同意我们需要无底深坑实验室。只是我们不太确定这笔开销是否值得。
深坑实验室实验1：跌入低谷

Text:
Using the variety of resources provided, the goal of the experiment was to measure how the different materials react to the changing circumstances while falling down the pit. The mass being dropped down is dubbed "The Payload".

The electronics equipment measured the effects of temperature, magnetism, atmospheric pressure and gravity on the various materials within the payload. We continued receiving data for almost a minute, without any indication of hitting the bottom. We even included fuel to explode when it would hit a bottom. We received no further data after this point, leaving the question about the bottom still unanswered.

The data with did get back will be instrumental in learning more about Mars' magnetic field, the effects of gravity closer to the core and how various materials are affected under those circumstances.

<effect> Unlocked a random Breakthrough tech.
Translation:
实验使用提供的各种资源，目的是测量不同的物质在深坑里下落过程中对不断变化环境作何反应。我们将扔下去的物质称为“货物”。

电子设备的作用是测量温度、磁性、大气压力以及重力对货物内各种物质的影响。数据接收持续了一分钟，没有任何触底的迹象。我们甚至装入了会在触底时爆炸的燃料。之后我们再也没有接收到数据，因此没能解答深坑有没有底的问题。

我们接收到的数据至关重要，能帮助我们进一步了解火星磁场、靠近火星核心处重力的效应以及在这些环境下，不同物质受影响的方式。

<effect>已解锁随机突破性技术。

Text: The experiment was mostly a success, giving us a lot of valuable data. Though it leaves the main question unanswered.
Translation: 实验大致成功，为我们提供了大量宝贵的数据。只是未能解答主要问题。

Text:
For the second big experiment our engineers came up with the brilliant and complex idea of making a big explosion. The idea being that a massive explosion should be a lot easier to detect and should at least confirm there's a bottom.

Many believe it to be irresponsible to throw a big bomb deep into Mars. Who knows what chain reaction it might trigger. Besides that, we also had to build a heat shield to avoid the bomb from going off to early by the temperatures we measured further down.
Translation:
对于第二次大型实验，我们的工程师想出了一个了不起且很复杂的主意：制造大爆炸。他们的想法是大爆炸应该更容易侦测到，且应该至少能确定深坑有底。

很多人认为把炸弹扔进火星深处是极不负责任的行为。没人知道这么做会引起何种连锁反应。除此之外，我们还能建造隔热护层，以避免炸弹因为我们测量到的深处温度而过早爆炸。
很好，我们看看会发生什么事吧。
深坑实验室实验2：临界质量

Text:
As we dropped the object down, we waited in anticipation. Some scared of what might go wrong, other excited about when we'd see the explosion.

It was after a few minutes that we started to realize something went wrong. At that point we'd long lost track of the bombs exact position and we still hadn't detected any kind of explosion. The possible explanations varied wildly; maybe we underestimated the extreme temperatures deep down the pit and the heat shield failed, or maybe one of the scientists forgot to turn on the detectors and we missed the explosion, and some are relieved that there was no unstoppable chain reaction triggered that might have doomed us all.

It sparked a lot of discussion amongst the scientific community, which fortunately did lead to some useful ideas.

<effect> Unlocked a random Breakthrough tech.
Translation:
我们把物件扔了下去，满怀期待地等待着。有些人担心可能会发生意外，其他人兴奋地等待着看到爆炸的那一刻。

几分钟后，我们开始意识到出问题了。那时我们早已无法追踪炸弹的确切位置，我们也尚未侦测到任何形式的爆炸。可能的解释五花八门。也许我们低估了大坑深处的极端温度，隔热护层没能发挥作用，也可能是某位科学家忘记打开探测器，导致我们错过了爆炸，有些人则松了一口气，因为没有引发不可阻挡的连锁反应，我们算是保住了小命。

科学界议论纷纷，幸运的是，他们讨论出了一些有用的想法。

<effect>已解锁随机突破性技术。

Text: Fortunately we didn't blow up Mars, yet we still haven't determined whether there's actually a bottom to this pit.
Translation: 好在我们没有炸毁火星，不过我们依然没能确定深坑是否有底。

Text: Pit Lab Experiment 3: Into the Unknown
Translation: 深坑实验室实验3：前往未知

Text:
With "Into the Unknown", the plan was to drop a large ball of Exotic Minerals into the pit. There are hardly no naturally occurring Exotic Minerals on Mars, which allows us to scan for it's specific signature with very little interference from the Martian soil.

The preparations and start of the experiment went on without a hitch. At first we were able to perfectly detect the ball as it was falling down. Though after about a minute our reading became rather controversial. By our calculations, the ball should have fallen through the core of the planet. And it was still going.

After about five minutes our scientists concluded something must have gone wrong. It seems the ball was still falling straight down, though it should be far beyond the other side of Mars. This led many scientists to come up with theories, some even replacing Einstein's theory of relativity.

<effect> Unlocked two random Breakthrough techs.
Translation:
“前往未知”的方案是把奇异矿物制成的大型球状物丢进深坑。火星上几乎没有天然形成的奇异矿物，因此我们能在几乎不受火星土壤干扰的情况下专门扫描奇异矿物的特征。

准备工作以及实验开始阶段十分顺利。首先，我们能非常清楚地扫描到下落中的大球。不过，大约一分钟后，我们的读数引起了争论。根据我们的计算，大球应该已经通过了星球的核心。但它仍在下落。

五分钟后，科学家得出的结论是一定有什么地方出问题了。大球似乎仍在笔直下落，但照道理它应该早就从火星另一侧掉出去了。很多科学家提出了假设，有些假设甚至无视了爱因斯坦的相对论。

<effect>已解锁两项随机突破性技术。

Text: Our readings were controversial and split the scientific community about what really happened.
Translation: 我们的读数引起了争议，科学界就究竟发生了什么而争论不休。

Text:
The controller reviewing the footage of our RC Explorer could not believe their eyes. Massive crystals fully occupy what was once a magmatic chamber. After the discovery, the controller reported a sense of euphoria when observing the crystals, making them reluctant to look away. 

We suspect the crystals to have a soothing, almost hypnotic effect on observers. Our psychologists suggest that the morale of colonist living in the vicinity of these crystals would benefit from the continual exposure to this effect. We should get a few in the area.

We are looking for locations in the cave to investigate further.

<effect> New vista available at the Cave of Wonders.
Translation:
控制员看到我们遥控探索者的录像时不敢相信他们的眼睛。巨大的水晶完全占据了曾经的岩浆房。在这个发现之后，控制员报告说当观察水晶时有一种快感，让他们不愿移开视线。

我们怀疑这种水晶对观察者有一种类似催眠的镇定作用。我们的心理学家认为，持续暴露在这种效应之下能提升居住在这些水晶附近的殖民地居民的士气。我们应该在该区域内获取一些水晶。

我们正在洞里寻找位置以进一步调查。

<effect>奇观洞穴的新景观可用。

<effect>奇观洞穴的新景观可用。

Text: We found massive crystals in what once was a magmatic chamber. They seem to have a soothing, almost hypnotic effect on our colonists. Objective: Move 3 colonists into the area. Optional: Further investigate the crystals.
Translation: 我们在之前是岩浆房的地方找到了巨大的水晶。这种水晶对我们的殖民地居民似乎有一种类似催眠的镇定作用。 目标：让3位殖民地居民进入该区域。 可选：进一步调查水晶。

Text: A site with easily accessible crystals.

The few colonists that moved into the Cave of Wonders can't stop talking about how excited they are about being on Mars, our mission and just feeling great in general.

We've got a number of psychologists monitoring them closely, though there don't seem to be any adverse effects thus far. They show a much more positive outlook on life and the mission, more eager to face challenge and not being deterred by adversity.

We think it's safe to expand our colony near the crystals. Our psychologists recommend we keep an eye on how this goes before starting to spread the crystals around the entire colony.
Translation:
进入奇观洞穴的那几位殖民地居民不停地说着他们能来到火星执行任务非常开心，总体感觉非常好。

我们的数名心理学家全程关注着他们的状态，不过到目前为止，没发现任何不良影响。他们对生活以及任务的前景展现出非常积极向上的态度，且更乐于面对挑战，在逆境中也勇于迎难而上。

我们认为把殖民地扩张到水晶附近是安全的。我们的心理学家建议我们先观察事态的发展再开始在整个殖民地内散播水晶。

Text: The crystals appear to be safe, and a positive influence on our colonists. Objective: Move 40 colonists into the area.
Translation: 水晶看起来很安全，且对我们的殖民地居民有积极的影响。 目标：让40位殖民地居民搬进该区域。

Text: Cave of Wonders: Crystal for everyone
Translation: 奇观洞穴：水晶人人有份

Text:
Expanding near the crystal cave has further confirmed them to be safe. Our psychologists are recommending we spread them throughout our colony, so everyone can enjoy it's hypnotic bliss.

Our engineers tried a number of experiments to extract the crystals or potentially recreate them. After some experimenting, a few geologists found a way to synthesize them from Exotic Minerals.

<effect> Unlocked the Wondrous Crystals building.
Translation:
扩张到水晶洞穴附近进一步证明了水晶是无害的。我们的心理学家建议我们在殖民地里散播水晶，这样人人都能享受到其美妙的催眠效果了。

我们的工程师们尝试了各种实验以开采或重新创造水晶。做了一段时间的实验后，几位地质学家想出了用奇异矿物合成出水晶的办法。

<effect>已解锁奇异水晶建筑。

Text: Now we can share the benefits with everyone
Translation: 现在我们能和大家有福共享了

Text: A few expert geologists found out how to synthesize replicas of the crystals from Exotic Minerals. Objective: Build a Wondrous Crystals decoration.
Translation: 几名地质学专家想出了用奇异矿物合成出水晶仿制品的办法。 目标：建造奇异水晶装饰

Text:
Colonists are coming from far and wide to visit the first Wondrous Crystals built in any dome, and bring stories home of its enticing beauty. It's the buzz of the colony and many can't wait to have one near their home.

The colonists living in the same dome show similar effects as those living near the Cave of Wonders. Our top psychologists are even enjoying the presence of the crystals.
Translation:
各地的殖民地居民都来参观穹顶内建起的第一块奇异水晶。他们回家后，还向身边的人诉说着水晶摄人心魄的美。水晶成了殖民地的热门话题，很多人都迫切想在自己家附近看到这种水晶。

住在同座穹顶内的殖民地居民展现出了和住在奇观洞穴附近居民类似的状态。连我们顶尖的心理学家都非常乐于欣赏这种水晶。

Text: We truly live in a great world
Translation: 我们确实生活在一个了不起的世界里

Text: The Wondrous Crystals are a success. We've learned all there is from the Cave of Wonders.
Translation: 奇异水晶项目取得圆满成功。关于奇观洞穴，我们的了解已经到极限了。

Text: The Cave of Wonders: The Source

Our geologists propose excavating the base of the main crystal in the hopes of revealing additional offshoots. They also speculate that, similar to patterns observed on earth, it is likely we will find valuable ores near the crystal's base. 

Regardless of what we find, we will also reveal more of the crystal improving the beneficial effects it has on nearby colonists.

If successful we will be sure to look for additional sites to excavate!

<effect> Reveal new deposits near the Cave of Wonders.
<effect> The Cave of Wonders vista’s morale boost is increased by <reg_param1>.
Translation:
我们的地质学家建议挖掘主水晶的底部，以期发现额外的分支。他们还推测，和在地球上观察到的模式类似，我们可能会在水晶底部找到宝贵的矿脉。

不管我们发现了什么，我们也会找到更多能给周围殖民地居民带来有益作用的水晶。

如果成功，我们将肯定会寻找更多的地方进行挖掘！

<effect>在奇观洞穴附近发现新的资源点。
<effect>奇观洞穴景观的士气加成提高<reg_param1>点。

Text: A site with various accessible crystals.
Translation: 这里有各种可获得的水晶。

Text: We excavated some of the crystals, exposing more of them. It seems to increase the benefits for colonists and we've also found some resource deposits along the way.
Translation: 我们开采出了部分水晶，又暴露出了更多水晶。它似乎强化了对殖民地居民的积极影响，我们还顺道发现了几处资源点。

Text: The Cave of Wonders: Gold Rush

In light of the previous findings our geologists are eager to excavate additional crystals. Scans reveal two excellent candidates, a red and a blue colored crystal. The different colors hint at the presence of different resources. Our geologists warn us to leave at least one of these crystals be in order to preserve the structural integrity of the cave. 

Should we excavate the red or the blue crystal? Or should we risk both? Don’t forget that next to the promise of resources we will also enjoy the benefits of having more crystals revealed to our colonists.  

We will continue searching for additional excavation candidates. 

<effect> Reveal new deposits near the Cave of Wonders. 
<effect> The Cave of Wonders vista’s morale boost is raised by <reg_param1>.
Translation:
根据之前的发现，我们的地质学家急于挖掘更多的水晶。扫描发现了两处绝佳的地点，红色和蓝色的水晶。不同的颜色显示不同资源的存在。我们的地质学家警告我们，至少留下一块这种水晶，以维持洞穴结构的完整性。

我们应该挖掘红色还是蓝色的水晶？还是说冒个险，两种都挖？别忘了，除了可能的资源外，还有个好处是能为我们的殖民地居民找到更多的水晶。

我们会继续寻找额外的挖掘地点。

<effect>在奇观洞穴附近发现新的资源点。

Text: Excavate the blue crystal (higher chances of water and rare metal veins)
Translation: 挖掘蓝色水晶（水资源和稀有金属矿脉的可能性更大）

Text: Excavate the red crystal (higher chances of metal and rare metal veins)
Translation: 挖掘红色水晶（金属和稀有金属矿脉的可能性更大）
Old Text: Excavate red crystal (higher chances of metal and rare metal veins)
Old Translation: 挖掘红色水晶（金属和稀有金属矿脉的可能性更大）

Text: Excavate both crystals (reveal many deposits & cause cave-ins)
Translation: 挖掘两个水晶（揭示更多资源点，同时导致塌方）

Text: Excavating another large crystal has revealed more resource deposits while even further increasing the soothing effects.
Translation: 开采下一块大型水晶时，我们发现了更多资源点，且进一步强化了其镇定作用。

Text: Excavating both colored crystals has revealed a ton of resource deposits while even further increasing the soothing effects. Unfortunately we did suffer some cave-ins in the area.
Translation: 同时开采两种颜色的大型水晶时，我们发现了大量资源点，且进一步强化了其镇定作用。不幸的是，我们在区域内遭遇了几次塌方。

Text: Final crystal site that would be suitable for excavation.
Translation: 适合挖掘的最终水晶地点。
Old Text: Final crystal site that would suitable for excavation.
Old Translation: 适合挖掘的最终水晶地点。

Text: The Cave of Wonders: The last crystal

Our Geologists have found another crystal formation they believe is suitable for excavation. There is a complication however, the associated deposits appear to be positioned in such a manner that we would need to dispose of the crystals in order to exploit them. We have to decide between increasing the benefits the Cave of Wonders offers our colonists or gaining access to additional riches. Reveals new deposits near the Cave of Wonders or the Cave of Wonders vista’s morale boost is raised by .
Translation: 我们的地质学家又发现了一处他们认为适合挖掘的结晶体。然而有点麻烦，相关联的资源点位置很尴尬，我们得先放弃这些水晶才能进行开采。 我们得做出选择，要么保留水晶增加奇观洞穴给我们的殖民地居民带来的好处，要么放弃水晶获得更多的财富。 揭示奇观洞穴附近新的资源点或奇观洞穴景观的士气加成提高。
Old Text: Our Geologists have found another crystal formation they believe is suitable for excavation. There is a complication however, the associated deposits appear to be positioned in such a manner that we would need to dispose of the crystals in order to exploit them. We have to decide between increasing the benefits the Cave of Wonders offers our colonists or gaining access to additional riches. Reveals new deposits near the Cave of Wonders or the Cave of Wonders vista’s morale boost is raised by 15.
Old Translation: 我们的地质学家发现了另一处他们认为适合挖掘的结晶体。然而有点麻烦，相关联的资源点位置很尴尬，我们得先放弃这些水晶才能进行开采。 我们得做出选择，要么保留水晶增加奇观洞穴给我们的殖民地居民带来的好处，要么放弃水晶获得更多的财富。 揭示奇观洞穴附近新的资源点或奇观洞穴景观的士气增加15。

Text: Excavate just the crystal cluster (Boosts Cave of Wonders vista's morale)
Translation: 只开采水晶簇（增加奇观洞穴景观的士气）

Text: Excavate the underlying deposits (Reveal new deposits near the Cave of Wonders)
Translation: 开采下层的资源点（显示奇观洞穴附近新的资源点）

Text: We managed to unearth the last crystal, creating the most beautiful vista our colonists have ever seen.
Translation: 我们设法挖出了最后一块水晶，创造出了我们殖民地居民见过的最美丽的景观。

Text: We've sacrificed the last crystal for some of the richest deposits we've ever seen.
Translation: 我们牺牲了最后一块水晶，换取我们见过的储量最丰富的资源点。

Old Text: Anomaly Analyzed : The Jumbo Cave
Old Translation: 异象已分析：巨型洞穴

Text:
Our explorers have made a startling discovery. We have come across a cave that is unparalleled in size here in the Martian underground. Our geologists speculate the cave is a solution cave and that it is further proof of the existence of large quantities of water in Mars’s past. 

While our Engineers are already planning what we could build in a space this large, our geologists warn that natural cavities of this scale could be rife with structural weaknesses. Together they are working on a plan to reinforce the cavern so we can expand into it in a safe manner. 

A site for the first experiment is being set up.

<effect> Jumbo Cave Reinforcements is now available to build.
Translation:
我们的探索者有了惊人的发现。我们在火星地下遇到了一个无与伦比的洞穴。我们的地质学家推测这个洞穴是个溶洞，这进一步证实了火星过去存在大量的水。

当我们的工程师们已经在计划我们可以在这么大的地方建造什么时，我们的地质学家警告说，这种规模的天然洞穴可能充满了结构弱点。他们正在一起研究如何加固洞穴的方案，这样我们就可以安全地扩张进洞穴了。

首个实验的地点正在建设中。

<effect>现在可以建造巨型洞穴加固了。

Text: Our explorers found a solution cave of unparalleled size in the Martian underground. Objective: Build the Jumbo Cave Reinforcements. Optional: Run some extra experiments before building the reinforcements.
Translation: 我们的探索者发现了一处火星上前所未见的巨大溶洞。 目标：建造巨型洞穴加固。 可选：在建造加固之前，再进行几次实验。

Text:
We've managed to successfully reinforce the Jumbo Cave. In the process we've learned a lot about the structural integrity of the Martian underground which has given our engineers a lot more confidence in building at a bigger scale.

The findings have also given our engineers some new ideas to try that may benefit our entire colony. They would like to experiment more with Exotic Minerals as a building material. Building a couple of Underground Medium Domes should provide them with a lot of practical data.

<effect> Unlocked the Underground Medium Dome
<effect> Unlocked spires in the underground
Translation:
我们设法成功加固了巨型洞穴。在此期间，我们对火星地下结构完整性有了深入了解，这给了我们的工程师们开展更大规模建造工作的信心。

这些发现还给了我们的工程师们新的创意，尝试这些创意或许能让整个殖民地获益。他们想要用奇异矿物作为建筑材料进行更多实验。建造几座地下中型穹顶应该能给他们提供很多有用的数据。

<effect>已解锁地下中型穹顶
<effect>已解锁地下尖塔

Text: The Jumbo Cave Reinforcements are a success. Our engineers are feeling inspired to experiment and push the boundaries even further. Objective: Build 3 Underground Medium Domes.
Translation: 建造巨型洞穴加固工程取得成功。我们的工程师们倍受鼓舞，准备继续进行实验，以求取得进一步突破。 目标：建造3座地下中型穹顶

Text: Jumbo Cave: Exotic Mineral Construction Tests
Translation: 巨型洞穴：奇异矿物建造测试

Text:
All comes with experience. Going through the process of building these Underground Medium Domes has taught our engineering team how to best use Exotic Minerals.

Our engineers and scientist are teeming with ideas. Creating more tranquil and luxurious homes, better looking gardens, increased colonist health, automatic water reclamation, and more. There's a palpable excitement in the air.

<effect> Unlocked an upgrade for most spire buildings
Translation:
经验是最好的老师。在建造地下中型穹顶的过程中，我们的工程师们学会了如何最有效利用奇异矿物。

我们工程师和科学家团队的灵感一来挡都挡不住。他们现在有办法建造更加安静且豪华的住宅、更漂亮的花园、提高殖民地居民健康度、实现水资源回收自动化等等。大家都沉浸在无比兴奋的气氛当中。

<effect>已为大多数尖塔建筑解锁一项升级

Text: It can't hurt to indulge them
Translation: 没事，就让他们兴奋一阵吧。

Text: After some practical experience, our engineers and scientists are teeming with ideas on how to apply Exotic Minerals. Objective: Finish one of the newly unlocked spire upgrades.
Translation: 我们的工程师和科学家团队通过实际经验，想出了很多应用奇异矿物的主意。 目标：完成一项新解锁的尖塔升级
巨型洞穴：尖塔升级完成

Text:
It seems our learnings from the Jumbo Cave have far outgrown the spacious cavern where we first started. Though it has given us interesting opportunities to learn more about life on Mars and we shall never forget that.

Most of our colonists are only focused on the new benefits our spires can provide them. We trust you, commander, to put all our efforts and discoveries to good use.
Translation:
看来我们从巨型洞穴里学到的东西已经远远超出了这座巨大的洞穴本身。不过它给了我们很多毕生难忘的有趣机会，让我们能进一步了解火星上的生命。

大多数殖民地居民只关心尖塔能给他们带来的新的好处。指挥官，我们相信你能善加利用我们的努力和发现。

Text: We've learned all we can from the Jumbo Cave.
Translation: 关于巨型洞穴，我们的了解已经到极限了。

Text:
Based on the data collected by our rover on the geological formations in the area our Geologists suggest an experiment. They believe that by applying small, controlled amounts of stress to the area, we can gain better insight into how to best support the overall structure of the Jumbo Cave. 

They admit the experiment has some small risks of cave-ins but emphasize the value of the data we stand to collect.
Translation:
根据我们的探测车在该区域收集到有关地质结构的数据，我们的地质学家建议进行一次实验。他们认为，通过对该区域施加少量可控的应力，我们就能更好地了解如何最有效地支撑巨型洞穴的整体结构。

他们承认实验有轻微的塌方风险，但他们强调我们要收集的数据值得我们冒险。

Old Text: The experiment is worth the risk. (if successful, it slightly reduces the constructions cost of the Jumbo Cave Reinforcements)
Old Translation: 这项实验值得冒险。（如果成功，将略微减少巨型洞穴加固的建造花费）

Text: Let’s not take any risks, the underground is harsh enough as it is.
Translation: 我们还是不要冒任何风险了，地下环境已经够严酷的了。

Text:
After a few tense moments, the team returns with good news. The experiment was a success and the data collected is invaluable to our efforts here in the Martian Underground.  

You made the right call Commander. The site for the next experiment is already being prepared.  

<effect> Gain <research(reg_param1)> Research
Translation:
焦急的等待过后，队伍带着好消息回来了。实验成功了，得到的数据对我们在火星地下的努力而言是无价之宝。

你做出了正确的选择，指挥官。下次实验的地点已经准备好了。

<effect>获得<research(reg_param1)>研究点数

Text: Marvelous, luck is on our side!
Translation: 太棒了，运气站在了我们这边！

Text: Our first experiment with controlled amounts of stress was a success.
Translation: 我们首次可控应力实验取得成功。

Text:
The rumble can be heard throughout the underground. Even before the reports come in it is clear the experiment did not go as planned. Luckily, the damage is not too severe, but we were unable to gain any new insights. 

We will be more careful as we prepare the next experiment.  

<effect> Causes minor cave-ins & some vehicles are damaged.
Translation:
整个地下都能听得到隆隆声。不用收到报告，大家显然也知道实验出岔子了。所幸损失不是太严重，但我们没能得到新的了解。

我们准备下次实验时会更加小心。

<effect>造成小规模塌方，部分载具受损。

Text: Unfortunately, luck wasn’t on our side this time.
Translation: 真不幸，这一次运气没有站在我们这边。

Text: Our first experiment with controlled amounts of stress was a failure.
Translation: 我们首次可控应力实验未能取得成功。

Text:
Building upon the results of the previous experiment, this one targets an area where the structural defects are much more complex. While this experiment has a higher risk of cave-ins, it also has the potential to result in more valuable data.  
 
The team is anxiously awaiting the greenlight before they proceed with the plan.
Translation:
在上次实验的结果基础上，这次的目标是一块结构缺陷更复杂的区域。这次实验的塌方风险更高，但也可能得到更有价值的数据。
 
队伍正在焦急地等待许可，然后他们才能继续实行计划。

Text: Let's go for it! (if successful, gain <research(choice_param1)> Research)
Translation: 我们开始吧！（如果成功，获得<research(choice_param1)>研究点数）

Old Translation: 我们开始吧！（如果成功，将获得2500研究点数）

Text: Let's not tempt fate. We have plenty of data already.
Translation: 我们还是不要冒险了。我们得到的数据已经足够多了。

Text:
Cheers can be heard coming from the team. Soon after, they report the good news; a successful experiment! We shouldn't be surprised that there is talk of a final experiment circling the room.

We were lucky this time, but don’t forget it could have gone very differently commander. 

<effect> Gain <research(reg_param1)> Research
Translation:
从这里都能听到队伍的欢呼声。不久后，捷报传来，实验成功！房间里的人都在讨论最终实验，我们不应该觉得惊讶。

指挥官，我们这次很幸运，但别忘了，下次的情况可能会大不相同。

Text: There was no doubt in our mind that we would succeed!
Translation: 我们心里始终坚信一定能成功！

Text: Our second experiment around more complex structural defects was a success.
Translation: 我们在较为复杂的结构缺陷附近进行的第二次实验取得成功。

Text:
The rumble can be heard throughout the underground. Even before the reports come in it is clear the experiment did not go as planned. We could have gone without the damage caused by the experiment, but the fact that we are empty handed leaves a bitter taste. 

For our final experiment we will take every precaution possible to prevent another failure. 

<effect> Causes cave-ins & some buildings are damaged.
Translation:
整个地下都能听得到隆隆声。不用收到报告，大家显然也知道实验出岔子了。我们本可以收手，不用承受实验造成的损失，但事实是我们一无所获，剩下的只有苦涩的失败。

至于我们的最终实验，我们会采取一切可能的措施防止再次失败。

<effect>造成塌方，一些建筑受损。

Text: Our second experiment around more complex structural defects was a failure.
Translation: 我们在较为复杂的结构缺陷附近进行的第二次实验未能取得成功。

Text: A potentially weak structure in the cave's geological make up that our geologists wish to analyze in order to improve the efficiency of the construction of the Jumbo Cave Reinforcements.
Translation: 我们的地质学家希望分析洞穴的地质构造中一处潜在的薄弱结构，以提升巨型洞穴加固的建造效率。

Text:
The rest of the team is quiet as the lead Geologist and Engineer present their plans for a final experiment in the Jumbo Cave. It is immediately clear that the odds of success are a lot lower than on previous experiments. On the flip side the resulting data we could obtain is nothing short of groundbreaking.

Please consider this carefully commander, for we might suffer the consequences of our hubris.
Translation:
当首席地质学家和工程师提交他们的巨型洞穴最终实验方案时，队伍中的其他人都静悄悄的。很明显，这次实验成功的几率比前几次低得多。另一方面，如果成功，那我们取得的结果数据将具有里程碑式的意义。

请谨慎考虑，指挥官，自信过头可能不会有好结果。

Old Text: We continue, no risk no reward. (if successful, it grants 5000 research points)

Text:
The rest of the team is quiet as the lead Geologist and Engineer present their plans for a final experiment in the Jumbo Cave. They plan to test a prototype reinforcement on a critically weakened area of the cavern. It is immediately clear that the odds of success of this final experiment are lower than those of previous ones. On the flip side the resulting data we could obtain is nothing short of groundbreaking. 

Please consider this carefully commander, for we might suffer the consequences of our hubris.
Translation:
当首席地质学家和工程师提交他们的巨型洞穴最终实验方案时，队伍中的其他人都静悄悄的。他们计划在洞穴的一处严重弱化区域测试加固原型。很明显，这最终实验的成功几率比前几次的要低。另一方面，如果成功，那我们取得的结果数据将具有里程碑式的意义。

请谨慎考虑，指挥官，自信过头可能不会有好结果。

Text: This is a risk not worth taking.

We have beaten the odds! The initial wave of relief is quickly replaced by elation as the results of the experiment start pouring in. The data is all we hoped it to be. The hard work of our Geologists and your decisiveness as a commander are what lead us to this unexpected breakthrough. 

You must be the luckiest person on Mars! 

<effect> Gain <research(reg_param1)> Research
Translation:
我们成功了！随着实验结果的不断涌现，最初心中大石落下的宽慰很快被兴奋和激动所取代。数据和我们预想的一致。多亏了我们地质学家的不懈努力，还有你作为指挥官的英明决断，我们才能取得这项出乎意料的突破性技术。

你一定是火星上最幸运的人了！

<effect>获得<research(reg_param1)>研究点数

Text: I’m just glad we’ve had no accidents along the way!
Translation: 我很高兴，我们一直没有发生意外！

Text: Our last experiment with prototype reinforcements was a success.
Translation: 我们用加固原型做的最后一次实验取得成功。

Text:
The familiar rumble of disaster can be heard throughout the underground. Even before the reports come in it is clear we failed again. The damage is severe, and we have nothing to show for it.  

The gamble has cost us dearly commander. Your luck appears to be truly rotten... 

<effect> Caused many cave-ins & several buildings are damaged.
Translation:
整个地下都能听得到熟悉的灾难隆隆声。很明显，不用等报告出来，我们又一次失败了。受损很严重，我们这波亏大了。

我们为赌博付出了惨重的代价，指挥官。你的运气似乎真的很差……

<effect>造成多处塌方，若干座建筑受损。

Text:
The rumble can be heard throughout the underground. Even before the reports come in it is clear the experiment did not go as planned. The damage is severe, and we have nothing to show for it. 

The gamble has cost us dearly commander…

<effect> Caused many cave-ins & several buildings are damaged
Translation:
整个地下都能听得到隆隆声。不用收到报告，大家显然也知道实验出岔子了。受损很严重，我们这波亏大了。

我们为赌博付出了惨重的代价，指挥官……

<effect>造成多处塌方，若干座建筑受损。

Text: Our last experiment with prototype reinforcements was a failure.
Translation: 我们用加固原型做的最后一次实验未能取得成功。

Text: Odd markings on the asteroid that warrant investigation.
Translation: 有必要调查小行星上的奇怪标志。

Text:
Astonishingly we have uncovered signs of organic life on this asteroid. We have discovered organic molecules which are the building blocks for life as we know it. While this isn't direct proof of intelligent life, it does raise the question of how this matter ended up here. 

Even though it doesn't look like much, a discovery like this is monumental. We should continue investigating this asteroid.
Translation:
爆炸性新闻，我们在这颗小行星上居然发现了有机生命的迹象。我们发现了有机分子，如我们所知，它是生命的基石。虽然它并不能直接证明智慧生命的存在，但确实给我们提出了一个问题：它是如何来到这里的。

尽管看起来不起眼，但这样的发现意义重大。我们应该继续调查这颗小行星。

Text:
Based on the number of traces of organic matter we keep finding, it becomes increasingly harder not to speculate. How did so many samples find their way onto this barren rock? Why haven't we found similar traces on other asteroids? And most importantly, is this proof that we are not alone?

We must keep searching this asteroid for clues. Every sample brings us closer to answering our questions.
Translation:
随着我们不断发现的有机物踪迹的数量越来越多，我们心里难免有种种猜测。这么多的样本是如何来到这块荒芜的岩石的？为什么我们没有在其他小行星上找到类似的踪迹？最重要的，这是否证明我们并不孤单？

我们必须继续在这小行星上寻找线索。每一块样本都让我们离问题的答案越来越近。

Text: We have found more organic samples.
Translation: 我们找到了更多的有机样本。

Text:
Our research team is abuzz with speculation about what our findings could mean. Some boldly claim this is proof intelligent life, while others are more reserved. 

Regardless, these findings are all the team is thinking about. They are proposing to broaden our search and investigate even more seemingly unconnected irregularities on this asteroid.

We can no longer keep this discovery under wraps, we must tell the public something. It is up to you, Commander, how we publicize it.
Translation:
我们的队伍对我们发现的意义议论纷纷。有些人大胆地宣称，这就是智慧生命的证明；而另一些人则更保守。

无论如何，整个团队满脑子想的都是这些发现。他们正在提议扩大我们的搜索范围，并调查这颗小行星上看似毫无关联的不同寻常的东西。

我们不能继隐瞒这一发现了，必须公诸于众。至于我们该如何公布它，由你来决定，指挥官。

Text: Keep it factual, it is too early to speculate any further. (All Scientists get Morale boost)
Translation: 实事求是，现在做推断还为时尚早。（所有科学家获得士气加成）
Old Text: Keep it factual, it is too early to speculate any further.
Old Translation: 实事求是，现在做推断还为时尚早。

Text: Showcase the samples in museums. Even if they're too small for people to see with the naked eye. (All Tourists get Satisfaction boost)
Translation: 在博物馆里展示样品。就算它们太小，人类的肉眼看不到也没关系。（所有游客的满足都得到提升）
Old Text: Showcase the samples in museums. Even if they're too small for people to see with the naked eye.
Old Translation: 在博物馆里展示样品。就算它们太小，人类的肉眼看不到也没关系。

Text: These are clearly a sign of God's earlier attempts at making humanity. (All Religious get Morale boost)
Translation: 这些显然是上帝早期创造人类的标志。（所有信仰者获得士气加成）
Old Text: These are clearly a sign of God's earlier attempts at making humanity.
Old Translation: 这些显然是上帝早期创造人类的标志。

Text: Nothing! They'll come up with some weird conspiracy theory either way.
Translation: 什么都不做！不管怎样，他们都会想出一些奇怪的阴谋论。

Old Text: Found signs of Life
Old Translation: 发现生命的迹象

Old Text: Found signs of God
Old Translation: 发现上帝的迹象

Text: More odd markings on the asteroid that warrant investigation.
Translation: 有必要调查小行星上更多的奇怪标志。
更多的不同寻常的东西

Text: We discovered more irregularities to be investigated.
Translation: 我们发现了更多需要调查的不规则的东西。
我们找到了更多的有机材料。

Text:
We would have missed it if not for our more detailed survey of the asteroid. We have found tiny pieces of what appears to be titanium plating embedded within the asteroid. Initial investigation indicates these pieces are at least a million years old. It seems highly likely that more pieces are present on the asteroid. 

Our research team hopes that can find something more substantial if we continue our search.
Translation:
幸好我们更详细地调查了小行星，否则就错过它了。我们发现了嵌入小行星的小块钛金属板一样的东西。初步调查显示，这些碎片至少有一百万年的历史了。小行星上很可能有更多这样的碎片。

我们的研究团队希望如果我们继续研究，就能有更重大的发现。

Text: The irregularities appeared to be titanium plating, we should gather as much as we can.
Translation: 这种不同寻常的东西似乎是钛金属板，我们应该尽可能多地收集它们。

Text:
Our efforts have paid off. We have dug up remnants of what our scientists describe as an alien satellite. The technology used appears to be relatively similar to ours, using many of the same building materials and circuitry. This begs the questions what happened to it and how did it end up on this asteroid. 

We can use the information we have gathered on the composition of the satellite to fine tune our scanners to look for additional samples. 

The satellite remnants themselves could be useful for a variety of things. Commander, how would you like us to proceed?
Translation:
我们的努力有了成效。我们已经挖掘出科学家称之为外星卫星的残骸。他们用的技术似乎和我们的相似，使用了很多相同的建造材料和电路结构。这就引出了问题：它到底出了什么事，是怎么来到这颗小行星的。

我们可以利用收集到的卫星构造的信息，对我们的扫描仪进行微调，以寻找更多的样本。

至于卫星残骸本身，可以有很多用途。指挥官，你想让我们怎么做？

Text: Strip it for parts! Electronics are a valuable commodity. (Gain <electronics(10000)>)
Translation: 把它拆开！电子元件是珍贵的商品。（获得<electronics(10000)>）
Old Text: Strip it for parts! Electronics are a valuable commodity. (Gain <electronics(10 * const.ResourceScale)>)
Old Translation: 把它拆开！电子元件是珍贵的商品。（获得<electronics(10 * const.ResourceScale)>）

Text: Extract any valuable data we can, regardless of what happens to the piece. (Gain <research(2800)>)
Translation: 不用管残骸会怎样，提取我们能提取的一切有价值数据。（获得<research(2800)>）
Old Text: Extract any valuable data we can, regardless of what happens to the piece. (Gain <research(28000)>)
Old Translation: 不用管残骸会怎样，提取我们能提取的一切有价值数据。（获得<research(28000)>）

Text: Analyze its parts to see what we can replicate. (Gain 50% of High Powered Jets research)
Translation: 分析它的部件，看看我们能复制什么。（获得50%高性能喷气机研究）

Text: Our scans reveal materials of the same density as the parts we have found so far.
Translation: 我们的扫描发现了和我们目前找到的零件相同密度的材料。

Text: We found the remnants of an alien satellite.
Translation: 我们找到了一颗外星卫星的残骸。
我们收集了更多的外星残骸。

Text:
We have found more samples of the satellite. Not only do they give us more insight the construction of it, but they also give a clearer picture of how it was destroyed. Based on an analysis of the damage on the samples, our leading hypothesis is that the satellite was destroyed by a violent collision. If this was with the asteroid or with another object, we can't say yet.

If only we could find the final pieces of the puzzle.
Translation:
我们找到了更多卫星的样本。它们不仅让我们更深入了解了其构造，也让我们更清晰地知道它是如何被毁的。根据样本的损坏情况分析，我们的主要假设是卫星被一次猛烈撞击摧毁。我们目前还无法确定撞击的是小行星还是其他对象。

如果我们能找到这个谜团最后的线索就好了。

Text: We are so close, keep searching!
Translation: 我们离结果很近了，继续寻找！

Text:
We have found not just more samples of the satellite, but also damage to the surrounding rock that leads us to believe this is an impact site! While we can't be completely sure, it seems incredibly likely that the satellite was destroyed when it got hit by this asteroid. It appears we have investigated all we can on this asteroid. 

Our work is done. We made history today Commander!
Translation:
我们不仅找到了更多的卫星样本，还发现了周围岩石受到的损伤，这让我们相信这就是撞击地点！虽然我们还不能完全确定，但卫星很可能是因小行星撞击而被毁的。看起来我们已经对这颗小行星做了一切能做的调查。

我们的工作完成了。我们今天创造了历史，指挥官！
我们收集了更多卫星样本。

Text: We have not been able to gather sufficient data to paint a complete picture. Our sponsors are disappointed with our findings and hope we will get another chance to make what promised to be the discovery of a lifetime.
Translation: 我们收集的数据不足以描绘一副完整的画面。我们的赞助者对我们的发现很失望，并希望我们下次能有机会做出有望载入史册的重大发现。

Text: We will be better prepared next time.
Translation: 下次我们会准备更充分。
我们收集的样本数太少了。

Text:
We have gathered enough data on this asteroid to paint a picture about the asteroid's journey through the universe.

Not only that, the asteroid has given us a new perspective on the rest of the universe with a few good samples to study further.

Rewards: Gain <funding(reg_param1)>
Translation:
我们在这颗小行星上收集了足够多的数据，可以描绘出一幅小行星在宇宙中旅程的画面。

不仅如此，这颗小行星还给我们提供了几块不错的样本，深入研究它们能让我们对宇宙的其他部分有全新的了解。

奖励：获得<funding(reg_param1)>
Old Text:
We have gathered enough data on this asteroid to paint a picture about the asteroid's journey through the universe.

Not only that, the asteroid has given us a new perspective on the rest of the universe with a few good samples to study further.

Rewards: Gain <funding(text_param1)>

我们在这颗小行星上收集了足够多的数据，可以描绘出一幅小行星在宇宙中旅程的画面。

不仅如此，这颗小行星还给我们提供了几块不错的样本，深入研究它们能让我们对宇宙的其他部分有全新的了解。

奖励：获得 <funding(text_param1)>

Text: We gathered a good number of samples.
Translation: 我们收集了大量的样品。

Text:
After a thorough investigation of the asteroid, we've managed to gather tons of samples to study what lies beyond our solar system.

The potential evidence for other intelligent life in the universe is the discovery of a lifetime. This asteroid has given us a new perspective on the rest of the universe and maybe even ourselves.

Rewards: Gain <funding(reg_param1)>
Translation:
在对小行星进行全面的调查后，我们设法收集了大量的样本，以研究我们太阳系以外的东西。

宇宙中其他智慧生命的潜在证据是千载难逢的发现。这颗小行星让我们对宇宙的其他部分，甚至包括我们自己有了全新的认识。

奖励：获得 <funding(reg_param1)>
我们收集了所有的样本！
我们收集了10个样本中的<reg_param1>
我们收集了15个样本中的<reg_param1>
我们收集了20个样本中的<reg_param1>

Text: There appears to be a vehicle of some kind.
This Is the Rover We Are Looking For!
Translation: 这就是我们要找的探测车！

Text:
We have discovered what appears to be a rover from the Russian agency. The rover is incredibly well built overall but it appears one of its components failed in these harsh environments nonetheless. 

The rover’s memory contains some valuable data, and our engineers reckon we can learn a thing or two by dismantling it. It isn’t our property though, and there might be consequences if we proceed without the owner’s permission. 

What should we do Commander?
Translation:
我们发现的似乎就是俄罗斯机构的探测车。探测车的整体构造异常精良，但它的一个部件似乎在这恶劣的环境中出了故障。

探测车的存储中包含宝贵的数据，我们的工程师认为可以通过拆解它学到些什么。但这不是我们的财产，如果我们不经主人的允许就这样做，可能要承担后果。

怎么办，指挥官？

Text: Our asteroid, our rover! (Keep the rover and the data)
Translation: 小行星是我们的，所以探测车也是我们的！（保留探测车和数据）

Text: This is not our business (Inform the agency but leave the rover alone)
Translation: 这不关我们的事（通知机构并放弃探测车）

Text: The owner is probably most interested in the data (Send the data to its owners and keep the rest)
Translation: 主人也许最关心数据（把数据发回给主人，并保留剩余的）

Text: We kept the rover and the data it collected.
Translation: 我们保留了探测车，还有它收集的数据。

Text:
We just received word from the owners of the lost rover, the Russian agency. It appears the tracking systems on the rover were still operational and the agency was still closely monitoring it.

They are furious with our handling of the situation and demand we pay for the damages we caused them. They expect us to cover the cost of 20 years of research.

What do we do Commander?
Translation:
我们刚刚从失踪的探测车主人俄罗斯机构那里得到消息。探测车上的追踪系统似乎还在运行，而机构仍在密切监控它。

他们对我们的处理方式感到怒不可遏，要求我们赔偿给他们造成的损失。他们希望我们支付20年研究的费用。

我们该怎么做，指挥官？
Old Text:
We just received word from the owners of the lost rover, the Russian agency. It appears the tracking systems on the rover were still operational and the agency was still closely monitoring it. 

They are furious with our handling of the situation and demand we pay for the damages we caused them. They expect us to cover the cost of 20 years of research.

What do we do Commander?

他们对我们的处理方式感到怒不可遏，要求我们赔偿我们给他们造成的损失。他们希望我们支付20年研究的费用。

我们该怎么做，指挥官？

Text: Pay the fine and apologize for our conduct (Pay 300M and engineers morale increases)
Translation: 支付罚款并对我们的行为道歉（支付300M，工程师士气提升）
否认所有指控（工程师士气下降）
Old Text: Deny all accusations  (Engineers morale decrease)
Old Translation: 否认所有指控（工程师士气下降）

Old Text: Honesty
Old Translation: 诚实

Text: The owner of the rover contacted us, we apologized and paid a fine.
Translation: 探测车的主人联系了我们，我们向他们道歉并支付了罚款。

Old Text: Dishonesty
Old Translation: 不诚实

Text: The owner of the rover contacted us, we denied the accusations.
Translation: 探测车的主人联系了我们，我们否认了指控。

Text:
The Russian agency contacted us after we informed them about their rover. While they regret our inaction, they ensure us they understand we can’t just deviate from our own objectives. 

They thank us for contacting them and ask if we would possibly reconsider rescuing their rover when the asteroid passes by Mars again in 243 years.
Translation:
在我们就探测车通知了俄罗斯机构后，他们联系上了我们。他们虽然对我们的不作为表示遗憾，但对我们的无暇他顾表示理解。

他们感谢我们联系他们，并询问我们能否在243年后小行星再次经过火星时营救他们的探测车。

Text: We decided to leave the rover alone.

We received word from the Russian agency about their rover. They were pleasantly surprised to receive the data they had presumed lost forever. The agency also offered no objections to us keeping the rover, as the data was the goal of their mission to begin with. They wish us luck and look forward to future cooperation. 

In the meantime, our engineers have been able to salvage the most valuable parts of the rover. We will consider the proceeds of selling these components as our reward for our good deed. 

<effect> Gain <metals(50000)> <electronics(30000)> <polymers(12000)>
<effect> Gain 300M
Translation:
我们收到了俄罗斯机构关于他们探测车的消息。他们对收到本以为已永久失去的数据感到惊喜。机构也不反对我们留下探测车，因为他们一开始的任务目标就是数据。他们祝我们好运，并期待着未来的合作。

同时，我们的工程师已经能回收探测车最有价值的部件。我们会把出售这些部件得到的款项视作对我们善举的奖励。

<effect>获得<metals(50000)> <electronics(30000)> <polymers(12000)>
<effect>获得300M

Text: Space is too large to go at it alone!
Translation: 宇宙太大了，不可能独立探索！

Text: We contacted the owner of the rover and got rewarded.
Translation: 我们联系了探测车的主人，并得到了奖励。

Text: We discovered a man-made rover. We don't know how it got here.
Translation: 我们发现了一部人造探测车。我们不知道它是怎么来这里的。

Text:
Commander, we have detected hazardous levels of radiation on the asteroid. These levels of radiation are dangerous to our colonists and buildings.

We have located the sources of the radiation on the asteroid. Several broken radioisotope thermoelectric generators (RTG) are scattered around the asteroid. They appear to be the remnants of an earlier unsuccessful Mars mission where the lander got intercepted by this specific asteroid.

We should clear radioactive materials as soon as possible to prevent any detrimental effects. Additionally, if we want to risk it, we could bring in some colonists that may be able to retrieve valuable research data and resources from these broken RTGs.
Translation:
指挥官，我们在这颗小行星上探测到灾害性的辐射水平。辐射的水平对我们的殖民地居民和建筑有危害。

我们已经找到了小行星上的辐射源。有几个损坏的放射性同位素热电发电机（RTG）散落在小行星上。它们似乎是早期一次未能成功的火星任务中的登陆舱残骸，因为被这个小行星拦截才落到了这里。

为防止产生有害影响，我们应该尽快清除放射性物质。另外，如果愿意冒险，我们可以让殖民地居民从这些损坏的放射性同位素热电式发电机中回收有价值的研究数据和资源。

Text: We will deal with the situation
We should clear the radiation from the asteroid to safely mine resources.
Translation: 我们应该清除小行星上的辐射，以安全地开采资源。

Text:
Commander, we have successfully decontaminated the asteroid. Radiation levels are back to normal and we should suffer no further casualties or equipment failure.

To avoid future problems like this, interplanetary law now requires any lander accidents to be reported and tracked. This should inform us in the future about dangers like this. Regardless, we are very happy to return to business as usual on the asteroid.

<effect>Morale boost for all colonists on the asteroid.
Translation:
指挥官，我们已经成功地清除了小行星的污染。辐射水平回到正常值，应该不会再有人员伤亡和设备故障了。

为避免今后出现类似问题，星际法律现在要求上报和追踪所有的登陆舱事故。今后再有这样的危险，我们应该会得到通知了。不管怎样，我们很高兴小行星上的一切恢复了正常。

<effect>小行星上所有的殖民地居民士气提升。
Old Text:
Commander, we have successfully decontaminated the asteroid. Radiation levels are back to normal and we should suffer no further casualties or equipment failure.

To avoid future problems like this, interplanetary law now requires any lander accidents to be reported and tracked. This should inform us in the future about dangers like this. Regardless, we are very happy to return to business as usual on the asteroid.

指挥官，我们已经成功地清除了小行星的污染。辐射水平回到正常值，应该不会再有人员伤亡和设备故障了。

为避免今后出现类似问题，星际法律现在要求上报和追踪所有的登陆舱事故。今后再有这样的危险，我们应该会得到通知了。不管怎样，我们很高兴小行星上的一切恢复了正常。

效果：小行星上所有的殖民地居民士气提升。

Old Text: Cleared the asteroid of radiation
Old Translation: 清除了小行星上的辐射

Text: The radiation has been fully cleared.

We have located the RTG debris and are ready to commence our cleaning operation. If successful it should reduce the radiation levels on the asteroid. We can go about this in various ways. 

We could use an RC Explorer. While this is probably the safest option, the lack of precision tools on the rover makes it difficult to clean the debris properly. Should it fail, it will only move the problem.

We could let Drones, which are much better equipped for the job, take care of the problem. It is possible though that exposure to the radiation will fry the drones inner circuitry, causing permanent damage.

The final option is to use this as a perfect research opportunity. We could send in a few colonists with protective gear to study the debris during clean up. Though this would require those colonists to risk their lives.

Unfortunately, neither of those are available on the asteroid. We have to bring rovers, drones or colonists to decontaminate the debris!
Translation:
我们已经确定了放射性同位素热电式发电机残骸的位置，并准备好开始清理工作了。如果成功，它应该能降低小行星上的辐射水平。我们有多种方式来解决这个问题。

我们可以使用一台遥控探索者。虽然这可能是最安全的选择，但探测车缺乏精密工具，这让清理残骸变得困难。如果失败了，它只会转移问题。

我们可以用无人机来解决这个问题，因为它们的装备更适合完成这项工作。但暴露在辐射下有可能烧毁无人机的内部电路，造成永久性的损坏。

最后的选项是把这当作一个绝佳的研究机会。我们可以派几名穿着防护装备的殖民地居民去清理，顺便研究残骸。但这会让那些殖民地居民冒生命危险。

很不幸，这两种方法在小行星上都不可用。我们必须用探测车、无人机或是殖民地居民去清除残骸！

Text: We'll get rovers, drones or colonists as soon as possible!
Translation: 我们需要尽快得到探测车、无人机或是殖民地居民！

Text: Use the RC Explorer, we can't risk anything else.
Translation: 使用遥控探索者，我们不能冒任何风险。

Text: Use Drones, we must ensure this gets cleared quickly.
Translation: 使用无人机，我们必须保证迅速清除。
清除放射性同位素热电式发电机的污染

We could use an RC Explorer. While this is probably the safest option, the lack of precision tools on the rover makes it difficult to clean the debris properly. Should it fail, it will only move the problem. We could let drones, which are much better equipped for the job, take care of the problem. It is possible though that exposure to the radiation will fry the drones inner circuitry, causing permanent damage. The final option is to use this as a perfect research opportunity. We could send in a few colonists with protective gear to study the debris during clean up. Though this would require those colonists to risk their lives. Unfortunately we have no colonists nearby. Text: Send in colonists, opportunities like this are rare.
Translation: 派出殖民地居民，这种机会实属难得。

Text:
The operation was a success. We managed to fully clear the area with the RC Explorer.

We reduced the radiation levels on the asteroid, reducing the danger for our colonists and equipment.
Translation:
行动成功了。我们设法用遥控探索者完全清除了该区域的污染。

我们降低了小行星上的辐射水平，减少对我们殖民地居民和设备的危害。
Old Text:
The operation was a success. We managed to fully clear the area with the RC Explorer.

We reduced the radiation levels on the asteroids, reducing the danger for our colonists and equipment.

行动成功了。我们设法用遥控探索者完全清除了该区域的污染。

我们降低了小行星上的辐射水平，减少对我们殖民地居民和设备的危害。

Text:
The operation failed. The RC Explorer managed to clear the location, but the majority of the debris still landed back on the asteroid.

Radiation levels still remain the same. We promise to try harder next time.
Translation:
行动失败了。遥控探索者设法清理了这里的污染，但大部分残骸依然落回了小行星上。

辐射水平依然保持不变。我们保证下次会更加努力。

Radiation levels still remain the same. We promise to try harder next time.

行动失败了。遥控探索者设法清理了这里的污染，但大部分残骸依然落回了小行星上。

辐射水平依然保持不变。我们保证下次会更加努力。

Text: Debris of a radioisotope thermoelectric generator is causing dangerous levels of radiation
Translation: 放射性同位素热电发电机的残骸正在造成危险的辐射水平

Text:
The operation was a success. We managed to fully clear the area using the Drones.

We reduced the radiation levels on the asteroid, reducing the danger for our colonists and equipment.
Translation:
行动成功了。我们设法用无人机完全清除了该区域的污染。

我们降低了小行星上的辐射水平，减少对我们殖民地居民和设备的危害。

Text:
The operation was a success, but at a cost. The Drones managed to fully clear the location, but shut down shortly after. Their inner circuitry has been completely fried.

We reduced the radiation levels on the asteroid, reducing the danger for colonists and equipment.
Translation:
行动成功了，但付出了代价。无人机设法完全清除了该地点的辐射，但不久后就失灵了。它们的内部电路已完全烧毁。

我们降低了小行星上的辐射水平，减少对殖民地居民和设备的危害。

Text: A Drone was destroyed by radiation
Translation: 一架无人机被辐射摧毁了

Text: Clearing failed, debris were scattered further.
Translation: 清除失败，残骸散落到了更远的地方。

Text:
The operation was a success. The colonists managed to fully clear the area and gather a lot of valuable research data.

We reduced the radiation levels on the asteroid, reducing the danger for colonists and equipment.
Translation:
行动成功了。殖民地居民设法完全清除了该地区的污染，还收集了大量有价值的研究数据。

我们降低了小行星上的辐射水平，减少对殖民地居民和设备的危害。

Text:
The operation was a success, but at what cost. The colonists managed to fully clear the area and gather a lot of valuable research data. Shortly after, however, some of the colonists started showing signs of radiation sickness. We tried our best to save them, but unfortunately they didn't make it.

We reduced the radiation levels on the asteroid, reducing the danger for colonists and equipment.
Translation:
行动成功了，但付出了什么代价呢。殖民地居民设法完全清除了该地区的污染，还收集了大量有价值的研究数据。但是，之后不久，一些殖民地居民开始出现辐射病的迹象。我们尽力试图挽救他们，但很不幸，他们没能活下来。

我们降低了小行星上的辐射水平，减少对殖民地居民和设备的危害。
区域清除，辐射水平下降。

Text:
Commander, a routine check shows that various systems were damaged during our landing on the asteroid. Our engineers are studying the reports to determine the cause; whether this operator error, or the result of a malfunction. They fear external interference may be responsible, but they require more information.

The Rocket is going nowhere until the damaged systems are repaired. In the meantime, we thought it would be worthwhile to investigate the surrounding area for possible causes. 

<effect> Rocket malfunctions and requires <electronics(20000)> to repair.
Translation:
指挥官，例行检查发现在我们登陆小行星的过程中，有多处系统受损。我们的工程师正在研究报告以确定原因，究竟是因为操作员的失误还是故障。他们担心可能是外部干扰的原因，但需要更多信息。

在受损的系统得到修复前，火箭哪儿也去不了。同时，我们认为有必要调查周围区域寻找可能的原因。

<effect>火箭失灵，需要<electronics(20000)>修复。

Text: We investigate as soon as possible!
A strange composition of materials foreign to the asteroid
Translation: 小行星外来的奇怪材料混合物

Text: Our rocket malfunctioned, we should investigate the landing site.
Translation: 我们的火箭出了故障，我们应该调查着陆地点。

Text:
The results of our analysis are baffling. There appears to be a device that generates magnetic fields embedded within the asteroid. How and why it was activated when we landed is still unclear, but our engineers are already analyzing the device in search of answers. 

The generated field could be responsible for our rocket troubles, but this device on its own would not be enough to cause the damage we sustained. We need to continue our search.

<effect> Gain <research(1500)>
Translation:
我们的分析结果令人费解。小行星内部似乎有产生磁场的装置。它在我们着陆时启动的方式和原因尚不明了，但我们的工程师已经在分析装置寻找答案了。

产生的磁场可能是我们的火箭出故障的原因，但这个装置本身不足以令我们受损到这种程度。我们得继续研究。

<effect>获得 <research(1500)>

Text: We have found a magnetic field generator. We should look for more.
Translation: 我们发现了一台磁场发生器。我们应该再找找。

Text:
As we suspected, there is a device embedded within the asteroid. This device generates magnetic fields and is likely responsible for damaging our first rocket. This does not appear to be the main device, however.

Our engineers are still happy to receive any data on the device's construction as they hope it can help us further our own research.

<effect> Gain <research(1500)>
Translation:
和我们怀疑的一样，小行星内部嵌入了一部装置。该装置产生磁场，可能就是我们第一枚火箭受损的原因。但这不像是主装置。

我们的工程师依然对收到该装置的结构数据感到高兴，因为他们希望这能帮助我们进行深入的研究。

<effect>获得 <research(1500)>

Our engineers are still happy to receive any data on the device's construction as they hope it can help us further our own research.

和我们怀疑的一样，小行星内部嵌入了一台装置。该装置产生磁场，可能就是我们第一枚火箭受损的原因。

我们的工程师依然对收到该装置的结构数据感到高兴，因为他们希望这能帮助我们进行深入的研究。

Text:
We have found another device nearly identical to the first. Our engineers were able to triangulate the position of a third device, referred to as the “trigger” device, by measuring the time between the initial two bursts.

We should investigate the location they indicated if we want any hope of getting to the bottom of this!

<effect> Gain <research(1500)>
Translation:
我们又找到了一台装置，和第一个几乎一模一样。我们的工程师能通过测量最初两次磁场爆发的时间差，用三角测量得出第三台装置，也就是所谓“触发”装置的位置。

如果想解开这里的谜团，我们就应该调查他们指示的位置！

<effect>获得 <research(1500)>

Text:
We have found another device nearly identical to the first. There is not much we can learn from this device that can help us here on the asteroid. 

Our engineers on Mars are still happy to receive any data on the device's construction as they hope it can help us further our own research.

<effect> Gain <research(1500)>
Translation:
我们又找到了一台装置，和第一个几乎一模一样。我们从这台装置上了解不到什么能在小行星上帮助我们的东西。

我们的工程师依然对收到该装置的结构数据感到高兴，因为他们希望这能帮助我们进行深入的研究。

<effect>获得 <research(1500)>

Text: We have found another magnetic field generator. We should keep investigating.
Translation: 我们又找到了一台磁场发生器。我们应该继续调查。

Text: The location where our engineers suspect we'll find a third device.
Translation: 我们的工程师怀疑我们会在那里找到第三台装置。

Text:
As a precaution our engineers put additional fail-safes and sensors in the systems that were damaged in the previous landing. We are happy to report that they have done their work. The rocket is still in perfect working order. 

The added sensors have measured unnatural magnetic fields coming from the asteroid. They even picked up a third signature as the rocket landed. We suspect that we’ll find something of interest when we investigate.
Translation:
作为预防措施，我们的工程师在上次着陆损坏的系统中加装了额外的保险装置和传感器。我们很高兴地报告，他们已经完成了工作。火箭仍能正常运转。

加装的传感器检测到了来自小行星的非自然磁场。它们甚至在火箭着陆时收到了第三个信号。我们估计能在调查时发现一些有趣的东西。

Text:
Based on the information we gained from the analysis of the device we found, our engineers have added fail-safes to this rocket's systems. They have done their work perfectly. All the rocket's systems are in complete working order.

The added sensors have measured unnatural magnetic fields coming from the asteroid. They even picked up a third signature as the rocket landed. We suspect that we’ll find something of interest when we investigate.
Translation:
根据从我们找到的装置分析得出的信息，我们的工程师在这枚火箭的系统上加装了保险装置。它们完美地发挥了作用。火箭所有系统运转正常。

加装的传感器检测到了来自小行星的非自然磁场。它们甚至在火箭着陆时收到了第三个信号。我们估计能在调查时发现一些有趣的东西。

Text: We will see what we can learn.
Translation: 我们看看能了解到什么。

Text: Based on the information we gained from the analysis of the devices we found, our engineers have added fail-safes to this rocket's systems. They have done their work perfectly. All the rocket's systems are in complete working order.
Translation: 根据从我们找到的装置分析得出的信息，我们的工程师在这枚火箭的系统上加装了保险装置。它们完美地发挥了作用。火箭所有系统运转正常。

Text: We landed a second rocket safely thanks to the new fail-safes. We should further investigate the asteroid.
Translation: 多亏新的保险装置，我们的第二枚火箭也安全着陆了。我们应该深入调查这颗小行星。
我们找到了一台先进的传感器

Text:
We have uncovered what appears to be an advanced sensor that responds to the proximity of other electronic devices. When triggered it sends a signal to activate other devices. 

The construction of the device is similar to technology we possess, but it does not match anything we have on record. While our Scientists speculate on its origin, they are unwilling to make a final statement on it.

What do we tell the public about these events? Regardless of how we report it, we were at least able to salvage several usable electronics from the device.

<effect> Gain <electronics(30000)>
Translation:
我们发现了一台先进的传感器，能对附近的其他电子设备做出反应。当它触发时，能发送信号激活其他装置。

这种装置的构造和我们掌握的技术很相似，但它和我们有记载的装置都对不上号。尽管我们的科学家对它的来源有种种推测，但他们还不想下最后的结论。

我们应该如何向公众报道这些事件？先不管我们如何报道，至少我们能从这台装置里回收若干可用的电子元件。

<effect>获得 <electronics(30000)>

Text: We have found proof of alien life! (Increases Morale of Colonists without a Specialization)
Translation: 我们找到了外星生命的证据！（提升无专长殖民地居民的士气）

Text: We have found technology of unknown origins. (Increases Morale of Scientists and Engineers)
Translation: 我们发现了来历不明的技术。（提升科学家和工程师的士气）

Text: We have successfully recovered from an attempt to sabotage our mission by a 3rd party! (Increases Morale of Officers and Tourists)
Translation: 有第三方企图暗中破坏我们的任务，但我们已恢复如初！（提升警官和游客的士气）

Text: We chose to say the sensor was proof of alien life.
Translation: 我们决定宣布，传感器是外星生命的证据。

Text: We chose to say the sensor was of unknown origins.
Translation: 我们决定宣布，传感器来历不明。
<green>小行星任务的激动人心的消息</green>
Old Text: Exciting news from the asteroid missions
Old Translation: 小行星任务的激动人心的消息

Text: We chose to say we recovered from an attempt to sabotage our mission by a 3rd party.
Translation: 我们决定宣布，有第三方企图暗中破坏我们的任务，但我们已恢复如初。

Text:
We received a touching message from one of Earth’s most influential astronomical societies. The astronomer that discovered this specific asteroid has unfortunately contracted a terminal illness. The message expresses their dying wish, to visit what has been their proudest achievement.

We rarely get the chance to reward scientists for their work in making what we do now a reality. Fortunately this is one of those chances. In order to get them to this asteroid, we need to get them on Mars first. Time is of the essence, so we should start making arrangements immediately.

<effect> 1 new Tourist applicant with the trait astronomer available
Translation:
我们从地球上一个影响力举足轻重的天文学会之一收到了一条感人的信息。发现这颗小行星的天文学家不幸染上了绝症。信息传达了他们的临终遗愿，那就是参观他们引以为豪的成就。

我们很少有机会表彰这些科学家，他们的工作使我们现在所做的一切成为现实。很幸运，这就是为数不多的机会之一。为了让他们来到这颗小行星，我们得先把他们接到火星上。时间宝贵，所以我们应该立刻开始安排。

<effect>1名带有天文学家特性的新应征游客可用

We rarely get the chance to reward scientists for their work in making what we do now a reality. Fortunately this is one of those chances. In order to get them to this asteroid, we need to get them on Mars first. Time is of the essence, so to we should start making arrangements immediately.

我们很少有机会表彰这些科学家，他们的工作使我们现在所做的一切成为现实。很幸运，这就是为数不多的机会之一。为了让他们来到这颗小行星，我们得先把他们接到火星上。时间宝贵，所以我们应该立刻开始安排。

<effect> 1名带有天文学家特性的新应征游客可用

Text: Let's make their wish come true.
Translation: 我们来实现他们的愿望吧。

Text: We got a request from a dying astronomer to visit this asteroid, inviting them to Mars is the first step to fulfilling it.
Translation: 我们收到一位时日无多的天文学家访问这颗小行星的请求，邀请他们去火星是实现目标的第一步。

Text:
The largest portion of the journey is behind us! The astronomer has safely arrived on Mars. Given their current physical condition, it was more challenging than usual. 

We should get them on an Asteroid Lander as soon as possible to make their dream come true. It would be a tragedy if they were to pass on so close to having their wish fulfilled.
Translation:
旅程的大部分已经过去了！天文学家安全抵达了火星。考虑到他们现在的身体状况，这比平时更具挑战性。

我们应该尽快让他们登上小行星登陆舱，让他们的梦想成真。如果他们在这么接近实现愿望的时候去世，那就太悲剧了。

Text: The astronomer has safely arrived on Mars. We should prepare an Asteroid Lander to get them to their asteroid.
Translation: 天文学家安全抵达了火星。我们应该准备一枚小行星登陆舱，带他们前往小行星。
Old Text: The astronomer has safely arrived on mars. We should prepare an Asteroid Lander to get them to their asteroid.
Old Translation: 天文学家安全抵达了火星。我们应该准备一枚小行星登陆舱，带他们前往小行星。

Text:
After traversing a staggering 250 million kilometers, we finally did it. We have brought an astronomer from Earth to the surface of the asteroid they discovered. 

However, the trip has taken its toll on the astronomer’s health. We had to stabilize them upon arrival, and they are only coming to as we speak. We would like to keep them stable for at least <reg_param1> sols, to give them the opportunity to fully appreciate this wonder in their final moments.
Translation:
经过了惊人的2.5亿千米旅程后，我们终于成功了。我们把一位天文学家从地球带到了他们发现的小行星表面。

然而，旅行让天文学家的健康状况雪上加霜。我们得在他们抵达时稳定他们的身体状况，现在他们刚刚苏醒。我们要维持他们的状况稳定至少<reg_param1>个太阳日，让他们有机会在生命的最后时刻尽情欣赏这个奇观。

Text: We will give it our all!
We should do whatever is required to keep the astronomer stable for at least 2 sols
Translation: 我们应该尽一切努力，让天文学家的状况至少稳定2个太阳日

Text: We did all we could, but the astronomer proved too fragile to endure the strain of space travel. It is truly a shame that they passed away so close to fulfilling their dream. A small consolation is that they had the chance to see their asteroid like never before. This is already an achievement in itself.
Translation: 我们已竭尽全力，但事实证明太空旅行对天文学家病体的负担实在太大。他们在距实现梦想仅一步之遥的时候去世了，真令人惋惜。聊以安慰的是，他们曾有机会以前所未有的方式看到了自己的小行星。这本身已经很了不起了。

Text: We'll try to take some solace in that.
The astronomer died before they were brought to the asteroid.
Translation: 天文学家在登上小行星之前就去世了。

Text:
We have reached the end of this journey. Against all the odds we managed to unite the fragile astronomer with their asteroid and managed to keep them stable long enough to fully enjoy the experience.

We discovered that they passed in their sleep, holding a letter addressed to you commander. They thank and wish to reward you for “a tremendous effort to make an old astronomer’s dream a reality”.

<effect> Gain <funding(800000000)>
<effect> Gain <research(3000)>
Translation:
我们已抵达旅程的终点。尽管困难重重，但我们还是设法让拖着病体的天文学家登上了他们的小行星，并让他们的身体状况稳定了足够长的时间，使他们能尽情享受这次经历。

最后，我们发现他们已经在睡梦中去世了，手里拿着一封写给你的信，指挥官。他们向你致谢，想要因为你“为实现一位老天文学家梦想而付出的巨大努力”而奖励你。

<effect>获得 <funding(800000000)>
<effect> 获得 <research(3000)>

Text: We are saddened by their death, but happy we could contribute to their dream.
Translation: 我们为他们的去世感到悲伤，但很高兴我们能为他们的梦想做出贡献。

Text: We fulfilled the astronomer's life long dream before they left us.
Translation: 我们在天文学家离开我们之前，实现了他们毕生的愿望。

Text:
The asteroid’s harsh conditions were too much for the fragile astronomer. Even though we technically made their dream come true, we hoped to give them a little more time to enjoy it. We contacted the astronomical society to deliver the unfortunate news, they commended us for our efforts and share our grief. 

It appears that the will of the astronomer states that those responsible for uniting them with their asteroid were to be rewarded. While we weren’t in it for the reward, we will make sure to put their contribution to good use. 

<effect> Gain <funding(500000000)>
Translation:
小行星的恶劣环境对病魔缠身的天文学家来说太严酷了。尽管从技术上我们实现了他们的梦想，但我们本希望能多给他们一些享受的时间。我们联系了天文学会，向他们传达了这个不幸的消息，他们和我们一起哀悼逝者，并赞扬了我们付出的努力。

看来，天文学家的遗嘱说，帮助他们来到小行星的人将得到奖励。虽然我们不是为了奖励而来，但我们一定会好好利用他们的贡献。

<effect>获得<funding(500000000)>

Text: We will keep their memory alive by continuing our exploration of asteroids.
Translation: 我们将继续探索小行星，让他们的记忆永存。

Text: The astronomer died soon after they were brought to the asteroid.
Translation: 天文学家在登上小行星后不久就去世了。

Text:
While searching in the Martian underground we have uncovered a device of unknown origin.

The purpose of the device eludes us for now, but initial evaluations indicate it is not made by human hands. But what excites our engineers the most is that is appears to be part of something bigger. It is receiving a signal from somewhere else, but the transmissions are getting weaker. If we hurry we can trace the source, but there is no guarantee we can trace it in time. 

Our scientist and engineers are discussing amongst each other how we should move forward. There is one thing they all agree on, the discovery is monumental and could change the future of our life on Mars.
Translation:
我们在火星地下搜索时，发现了一部来历不明的装置。

装置的用途尚不明确，但初步评估表明它不是人类制造的。但最让我们工程师兴奋的是，它似乎是更大的东西的一部分。它在从别处接收信号，但信号正变得越来越弱。我们如果抓紧时间，就能追踪到来源，但无法保证时间来得及。

我们的科学家和工程师们正在讨论下一步的计划。有一点是他们都同意的，那就是这个具有里程碑意义的发现将改变我们未来的火星生活。

Text: We should reverse engineer the device and learn as much as possible. (Gain <research(4000)>)
Translation: 我们应该对装置进行逆向工程，尽可能多地从中学习。（获得<research(4000)>）
Old Text: We should reverse engineer the device and learn as much as possible. (4000 Research Points)
Old Translation: 我们应该对装置进行逆向工程，尽可能多地从中学习。（4000研究点数）

Text: This discovery is not just ours and needs to be shared with all of humanity. (40 Scientist Applicants)
Translation: 这项发现不仅仅属于我们，应该向全人类分享。（40名科学家应征者）

Text: Finding what this device is part of is our top priority! (Locate a temporary anomaly)
Translation: 找到装置从属的部分是最重要的！（定位一处临时异象）
Old Text: Finding what this device is part of is out top priority! (Locate a temporary anomaly)
Old Translation: 找到装置从属的部分是最重要的！（定位一处临时异象）

Text: Could this be the origin of the signal?

The anomaly appears to be a series of incongruent tracks. Some appear to be caused by the flow of liquids, while others seem to result from the moving of large rocks. 

The nearby area doesn't yield many answers as to what could have caused this confounding scene. There isn't much more to do but follow the trail. Where they terminate is still a mystery but we can only hope to find answers.
Translation:
异常似乎是一系列不一致的轨迹。有些似乎是液体流动造成的，而其他则是移动大型岩石的结果。

这一令人困惑的场景是如何产生的？我们在附近区域找不出多少答案。除了沿着轨迹寻找也没什么好做的。轨迹的尽头在何处仍然是个谜，但我希望能找到答案。

Text: The reading is similar to that of the initial tracks...
Translation: 读数与最初的轨迹相似……

Text:
We have discovered an asteroid that has made it into the tunnel system below the surface of Mars.

Curiously there is no sign of an entry point, indicating that the asteroid has been moved by an unknown force. 

The Asteroid itself contains Exotic Minerals that we believe can't be found on Mars natively. We need to make a choice on how we can best utilize this unique opportunity. It is either a rich source of Exotic Minerals or a potential lesson on the world above and below us.
Translation:
我们发现了一颗小行星，它已经进入了火星地表下的隧道系统。

奇怪的是没有入口的迹象，这表明小行星是被一种未知的力量移动的。

小行星本身含有我们认为在火星上找不到的奇异矿物。我们得做出决定，如何最好地利用这次独特的机遇。要么选择丰富的奇异矿物资源，要么把它当成一次潜在的了解我们之外世界的机会。
Old Text:
We have discovered an asteroid that has made it into the tunnel system below the surface of mars. 

Curiously there is no sign of an entry point, indicating that the asteroid has been moved by an unknown force. 

The Asteroid itself contains Exotic Minerals that we believe can't be found on Mars natively. We need to make a choice on how we can best utilize this unique opportunity. It is either a rich source of Exotic Minerals or a potential lesson on the world above and below us.

小行星本身含有我们认为在火星上找不到的奇异矿物。我们得做出决定，如何最好地利用这次独特的机遇。要么选择丰富的奇异矿物资源，要么把它当成一次潜在的了解我们之外世界的机会。

Text: Extract the Exotic Minerals from the Asteroid (Gain <preciousminerals(40000)>)
Translation: 从小行星提炼奇异矿物（获得<preciousminerals(40000)>）
Old Text: Extract the Exotic Minerals from the Asteroid (+40 Exotic Minerals)
Old Translation: 从小行星提炼奇异矿物（+40 奇异矿物）

Text: Research the asteroid and use the findings to develop new technologies for our own expansion. (Unlock new Recon and Expansion Tech)
Translation: 研究小行星，利用发现为我们的扩张开发新技术。（解锁新的侦察与扩张技术）

Text:
The anomaly turned out to be a micro robot that has been wandering these tunnels for a long time. 

Our scientists are baffled that it is still wandering these tunnels to this day. It appears to be a remnant from an initiative just after the turn of the century to explore the Martian underground and evaluate their viability as a base and shelter for small groups of astronauts. We can only hope that its creators are still amongst us to witness how we have finally realized their vision.

We will put the little thing's work to good use. 

<effect> Reduces the cost of Recon and Expansion techs by 10%
Translation:
异象原来是一个微型机器人，在这些隧道里游荡了很久了。

至于它为什么至今仍在这些隧道里游荡，我们的科学家还是困惑不解。这似乎是在世纪之交后一项提议的残余物，该提议旨在探索火星地下并评估其成为一小队宇航员基地和庇护所的可行性。我们只能希望它的创始人能和我们一起见证我们最后实现了他们的愿景。

我们会好好利用这个小东西的工作成果。

<effect> 减少10%的侦察和扩张技术花费

Text: We discovered a vibrating stalactite. The vibrations are hard to detect, but we find no such readings in the surrounding deposits. Our geologists are imploring that we need to investigate further, claiming that it give us insights into the times when Mars still had an atmosphere similar to Earth's.
Translation: 我们发现了一根振动的钟乳石。振动微不可查，但我们在周围的资源点没发现这样的读数。我们的地质学家恳求我们深入调查，他们说这能让我们了解火星拥有与地球相似大气层的时代。
Old Text: We discovered a vibrating stalagmite. The vibrations are hard to detect, but we find no such readings in the surrounding deposits. Our geologists are imploring that we need to investigate further, claiming that it give us insights into the times when Mars still had an atmosphere similar to Earth's.
Old Translation: 我们发现了一个振动的石笋。振动微不可查，但我们在周围的资源点没发现这样的读数。我们的地质学家恳求我们深入调查，他们说这能让我们了解火星拥有与地球相似大气层的时代。

Text: Scan the formation from a safe distance (Gain <research(1000)>)
Translation: 从安全距离扫描结构（获得<research(1000)>）
Old Text: Scan the formation from a safe distance
Old Translation: 从安全距离扫描结构

Text: Take a physical sample (risk of creating a cave-in)
Translation: 取一块物理样本（有塌方风险）
Old Text: Take a physical sample
Old Translation: 取一块物理样本

Old Text: Stalagmite Rubble
Old Translation: 石笋碎石

Text: The stalactite collapsed! Our RC Explorer got damaged in the process and needs repairs. On the bright side, we are literally covered in samples to analyze. We just need to pick through the rubble to find the most usable ones.
Translation: 钟乳石塌了！我们的遥控探索者在此过程中受损，需要维修。好的一面是，我们得到了很多需要分析的样本。我们只需要在碎石中找到最可用的。
Old Text: The stalagmite collapsed! Our RC Explorer got damaged in the process and needs repairs. On the bright side, we are literally covered in samples to analyze. We just need to pick through the rubble to find the most usable ones.
Old Translation: 石笋塌了！我们的遥控探索者在此过程中受损，需要维修。好的一面是，我们得到了很多需要分析的样本。我们只需要在碎石中找到最可用的。

Text: Our rover has stumbled across a slew of resources. Upon closer inspection they seem to have originated from the Martian surface and have found their way into the underground through a series of cracks and fractures. While the coincidence is staggering, we will reap the benefits!
Translation: 我们的探测车意外发现了大量资源。通过仔细检查，它们似乎来自火星表面，通过一系列的缝隙和裂缝进入了地下。巧合就是这么不可思议，好处我们就收下了！

Text: Let's not look a gift horse in the mouth!
Translation: 白得的礼物就不要挑挑拣拣了！

Text:
We seem to have stumbled upon some volcanic melt inclusion. These microscopic, solidified bubbles of magma could grant our geologists insights in the volcanic activity and magma composition of the surrounding area. After analyzing the data, they have provided us with a number of locations they speculate could contain rich rare metal deposits. 

It might be worth our time to investigate further.
Translation:
我们似乎偶然发现了一些火山熔融物。这些微观的凝固熔岩气泡可以让我们的地质学家了解火山活动和周围地区的岩浆组成。在经过数据分析后，他们告知了我们几处他们认为可能富含稀有金属的资源点位置。

这也许值得我们花时间深入调查。

Text: Let's see what we can do
Translation: 让我们看看能查出什么

Text: A potential location of a rich rare metals deposit based on our analysis of the melt inclusion.
Translation: 根据我们对火山熔融物的分析，确定了一处潜在的稀有金属资源点位置。

Text: Our rover has discovered a crevice in the rocks. It is large enough for the rover to pass through, but our sensors are unable to determine where the crevice leads. We can send the rover in but there is no guarantee where it will end up and if it will be able to return.
Translation: 我们的探测车在岩石中发现了一条裂缝。它大到足够让探测车通过，但我们的传感器无法确定裂缝通向何处。我们可以让探测车进去，但无法保证它会停在哪里，以及是否能够返回。
别用我们的探测车冒险。

Text: The rover has emerged on the other side of the crevice relatively undamaged. However, the passage has collapsed behind it preventing it from returning. We still have a signal so we can still follow and direct the movements of the rover. Whether we are able to bring it back home by another route is something we have yet to find out.
Translation: 探测车出现在裂缝的另一边，基本上没受什么损伤。但是，它后面的通道已经倒塌，无法返回。我们还有信号，所以我们还能追踪和指挥探测车的移动。我们现在还不清楚能否另想办法将它开回来。

Text:
We've discovered the remains of an asteroid that hit the Martian surface millions of years ago. There wasn't much left, but we were able to extract some Exotic Minerals from the remains. A rare type of mineral, normally not found on Earth or Mars.

<effect> Found Exotic Minerals (<preciousminerals(reg_param1)>)
Translation:
我们发现了几百万年前坠落在火星表面的一颗小行星的残骸。虽然残骸残缺不全，但我们还是设法从中提取出了一些奇异矿物。这种矿物十分稀有，在地球或火星上一般找不到。

<effect>已发现奇异矿物（<preciousminerals(reg_param1)>）
Old Text: We've discovered the remains of an asteroid that hit the Martian surface millions of years ago. There wasn't much left, but we were able to extract some Exotic Minerals from the remains. A rare type of mineral, normally not found on Earth or Mars.
Old Translation: 我们发现了几百万年前坠落在火星表面的一颗小行星的残骸。虽然残骸残缺不全，但我们还是设法从中提取出了一些奇异矿物。这种矿物十分稀有，在地球或火星上一般找不到。

Text:
We made it in time and our efforts have paid off. We stand before a controlling device unlike anything we have ever witnessed.

Without a second's hesitation our engineers started researching the machine. Their initial findings still leave us in the dark regarding its origin but it seems we can utilize the technology to our advantage.
Translation:
我们做到了，努力没有白费。我们站在从未见过的控制装置前。

我们的工程师们毫不犹豫地开始研究机器。他们初步的发现仍然让我们对它的来源一头雾水，但我们似乎可以从这种技术中获益。

Text: Lets see what this can do!

<Effect> Gain 30 Machine Parts and 2000 Research Progress

我们做到了，努力没有白费。我们站在从未见过的控制装置前。

我们的工程师们毫不犹豫地开始研究机器。他们初步的发现仍然让我们对它的来源一头雾水，但我们似乎可以从这种技术中获益。

<Effect>获得30单位机械零件和2000点研究进度

Text:
We have discovered more of the odd tracks. We must be getting closer.

It appears that more tracks are converging and heading in the same direction.
Translation:
我们发现了更多奇怪的轨迹。我们一定接近了。

似乎有更多轨迹在汇集，前往同一方向。

Text: Could this be where the tracks terminate?
Translation: 这是轨迹终止的地方吗？

Text:
We have found what we believe to be the end of the trail. A collection of objects and resources that is quite valuable to us.

We can salvage the useful materials from between the rocks and debris. Our scientists are still uncertain about the cause of this phenomenon. 

<effect> Gain <preciousmetals(17000)> <polymers(21000)> <metals(32000)>
Translation:
我们应该算是到了轨迹的尽头。有一堆很有价值的物品和资源在等着我们。

我们可以从岩石和残骸中回收有用的材料。我们的科学家仍然不确定这种现象的成因。

<effect>获得<preciousmetals(17000)> <polymers(21000)> <metals(32000)>
Old Text:
We have found what we believe to be the end of the trail. A collection of objects and resources that is quite valuable to us.

We can salvage the useful materials from between the rocks and debris. Our scientists are still uncertain about the cause of this phenomenon. 

<Effect> Gain 17 Rare Metals, 21 Polymers & 32 Metals
Old Translation:
我们应该算是到了轨迹的尽头。有一堆很有价值的物品和资源在等着我们。

我们可以从岩石和残骸中回收有用的材料。我们的科学家仍然不确定这种现象的成因。

<Effect>获得17稀有金属、21聚合物和32金属

Text: Lets take what is useful to us.
Translation: 我们带走有用的东西吧。

Text:
We have found what we believe to be the end of the trail. A dark pit that swallows all the tracks.

The technology that we possess is unable to determine the depth of this pit. Scientists are confused and unnerved by this odd phenomenon. It seems like objects are occassionally ever so slowly pulled towards its gaping abyss, only to be dragged past the edge never to be seen again. 

The scientists wish to experiment and study the hole, convinced that there are answers to the currently inexplicable behavior. 

<effect> Unlocks the Buried Wonder: The Bottomless Pit
Translation:
我们应该算是到了轨迹的尽头。一个黑暗的深坑吞噬了所有的轨迹。

我们掌握的技术不足以测量这个坑的深度。科学家们对这种奇怪的现象感到困惑和不安。似乎偶尔有物体被缓慢地拖向裂开的深渊，掉进去后就再也没人见到过。

科学家们希望能对这个窟窿进行实验和研究，他们相信能找到目前这种无法解释现象的答案。

<effect>解锁埋藏的奇观：无底深坑
Old Text:
We have found what we believe to be the end of the trail. A dark pit that swallows all the tracks.

The technology that we possess is unable to determine the depth of this pit. Scientists are confused and unnerved by this odd phenomenon. It seems like objects are occassionally ever so slowly pulled towards its gaping abyss, only to be dragged past the edge never to be seen again. 

The scientists wish to experiment and study the hole, convinced that there are answers to the currently inexplicable behavior. 

<Effect> Unlocks the Buried Wonder, the Bottomless Pit
